name: prodigal

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Fast, reliable protein-coding gene prediction for prokaryotic genomes.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependent_to.name: py-drep
dependent_to.description:
dRep is a python program for rapidly comparing large numbers of genomes.
dRep can also "de-replicate" a genome set by identifying groups of
highly similar genomes and choosing the best representative genome for
each genome set.

dependent_to.name: py-instrain
dependent_to.description:
inStrain is python program for analysis of co-occurring genome
populations from metagenomes that allows highly accurate genome
comparisons, analysis of coverage, microdiversity, and linkage, and
sensitive SNP detection with gene localization and synonymous non-
synonymous identification.

dependent_to.name: pharokka
dependent_to.description:
pharokka is a rapid standardised annotation pipeline for bacteriophage
genomes

dependent_to.name: py-bakta
dependent_to.description:
Bakta: rapid & standardized annotation of bacterial genomes, MAGs &
plasmids

dependent_to.name: prokka
dependent_to.description:
Prokka is a software tool to annotate bacterial, archaeal and viral
genomes quickly and produce standards-compliant output files.

dependent_to.name: py-checkm-genome
dependent_to.description:
Assess the quality of microbial genomes recovered from isolates, single
cells, and metagenomes

dependent_to.name: busco
dependent_to.description:
Assesses genome assembly and annotation completeness with Benchmarking
Universal Single-Copy Orthologs

dependent_to.name: py-gtdbtk
dependent_to.description:
GTDB-Tk is a software toolkit for assigning objective taxonomic
classifications to bacterial and archaeal genomes based on the Genome
Database Taxonomy (GTDB).
